name: Symbol Of Fear
text:
This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within 60 feet of the symbol of fear instead become panicked for 1 round per caster level.

NoteMagic traps such as symbol of fear are hard to detect and disable. While any character can use Perception to find a symbol, only a character with the trapfinding class feature can use Disable Device to disarm it. The DC in each case is 25 + spell level, or 31 for symbol of fear.
component_text: V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth a total of 1,000 gp)
